role.argrole: thing insisted, required (usually marked by على )

example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (NP-SBJ (PRON_3MS هو)) (NP-PRD (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_NOM موقف)) (SBAR (WHNP-1 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS عكس) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (S-NOM-OBJ (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_ACC اصرار) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN رئيس) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الجمهورية))) (PP-CLR (PREP على) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN منع) (NP (NP (NOUN_QUANT+CASE_DEF_GEN اي) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN تعرض))) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN لامن) (CONJ و) (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الاستقرار))))

arg.g: on preventing any interference with security and stability

example.arg: على منع اي تعرض للامن والاستقرار
